content:
# The movement to the position (20, -12) was successful. This indicates that the incremental movement commands are functioning correctly.

# I will now attempt to move even closer to the coal resource, but this time I will take a very small step to ensure that I can place the stone furnace without exceeding the maximum distance.
move_to(Position(x=21, y=-13))  # Move closer to the coal position with a smaller increment.
